title: Ever since 'latency' fix gameplay has been anything but smooth
body: Me and a few friends have noticed our ping has risen by about 20-40 and sometime it will spike up another 50.  I've gone from 35 ping to 60 ping and sometimes 100 randomly.  The only thing the latency fix has done is made everyone else playing lag.  Really hard to land a Q when it has a half second cast time.

replies.body:
http://imgur.com/a/YVFZA

I've done tracerts and other things because I used to lag heavily and had to file with the FCC in order to get my ISP to pay attention to me and for over 8 months now after they resolved it I haven't ever had anything but 39 ping.  Since update I've had 41-91 ping and sometimes a massive spike.  When I send out tracert to other IP's there isn't a stutter or a packet loss on its way.  It seems to be related to the update and that's about all I could figure out on it.

Oh glob I can only imagine the frustration of Morgana's Q having a cast time O_O.....

Let's see if we can iron out some of those ping spikes a bit. First I want to test something to see just what kind of lag we're dealing with. If you could grab your most recent game logs then goto our [**log reader**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/209765743) and pop them in there for it to analyze. Once it's done, take screenshot and post it here using something like Gyazo or Imgur.
